row.process: :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#,CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#,CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# = STR_TRIM(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) :SET &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# = STR_TRIM(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) write-host "Checking if PNG file exists for runid: &CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#) > 0 if (Test-Path "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#") { write-host "Found PNG at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#, delete it now" Remove-Item &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH# write-host "Deleted &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" } else { write-host "Could not find PNG file at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PNG_PATH#" write-host "Already deleted?" } :ENDIF write-host "Checking if PDF file exists for runid: &CAPTURE_CLEANUP_RUNNR#" :IF STR_LENGTH(&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#) > 0 if (Test-Path "&CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#") { write-host "Found PDF at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#, delete it now" Remove-Item &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH# write-host "Deleted &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" } else { write-host "Could not find PDF file at: &CAPTURE_DASHBOARD_PDF_PATH#" write-host "Already deleted?" } :ENDIF __uc_return(0)
